sentences.english: Militant mineworkers in the Ukraine have voted for a one-day stoppage next month.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰激进的矿工们已经投票决定下个月罢工一天。

sentences.english: The miners stayed alive by drinking water that seeped through the earth and were in a stable condition, Wang said.
sentences.chinese: 三位矿工依靠地下不断渗出的水撑了下来，王说。

sentences.english: The coalminers decided to go on strike for better working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 煤矿工许多人决定为争取更好的工作条件举行罢工。

sentences.english: Now as you might guess, This can make gas hydrate kind of hard for miners to handle.
sentences.chinese: 你应该已经猜想到这会使矿工们很难处理它们。

sentences.english: I had been living for weeks in rough mining camps with other gold miners.
sentences.chinese: 几个星期以来我一直活在粗糙的矿场和其他黄金矿工。

sentences.english: Many people think that cornish pasties is miners special food for centuries .
sentences.chinese: 不少人认为这种馅饼是近几个世纪来矿工人的粮食。

sentences.english: Araya was the sixth from the 33 trapped miners to be lifted from underground.
sentences.chinese: 安瑞亚是被困的33名矿工中得到解救的第六个。

sentences.english: Miners knocking back middies in Port Hedland yesterday had reason to cheer.
sentences.chinese: 昨日在黑德兰港痛饮的矿工们有理由欢呼。

sentences.english: Xiao Xu's father is a miner.
China extends its congratulations and wishes them early recovery of health.
sentences.chinese: 中方对此表示祝贺，并祝愿获救矿工早日恢复健康。

sentences.english: The number of miners killed in the accident runs into dozens.
sentences.chinese: 在这次事故中矿工死了好几十人。

sentences.english: Most of the miners were unable to walk unassisted and some were placed on stretchers.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的矿工不能独立行走，还有一些被抬在担架上。

sentences.english: A miner's lamp is fixed onto his helmet.
sentences.chinese: 矿灯巩固在矿工的头盔上。

sentences.english: One of the miners managed to get out alive. He's thought to be a 14-year-old boy, who sustained severe injuries.
sentences.chinese: 一名14岁的矿工成功生还，但是身受重伤。

sentences.english: I must call Behrman up to be my model for the old miner.
sentences.chinese: 我得叫贝尔曼上楼来给我当老矿工模特儿。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
